page.title: 08Old Forge Garage St Minver
page.content: At St Minver is a garage which services vehicles. The garage is on the site of an{old blacksmith's forge. It was opened in{1964,}the present owner has been there since{1975. People from all around the district come to have their cars serviced at St Minver. A{24 hour breakdown}service is operated. The owner is assisted by a mechanic, 2 pump attendants and the owner's wife is the office clerk. On average they service 200 cars a year. Since the present owner has been there they have built a new office extension. Current petrol prices are{ {Â£0.45 and Â£0.446}per litre. During Winter their working hours are 8 to 6 Monday to Friday and they are closed on Sunday. During the Summer, in the tourist season, hours are{8am to 8pm Monday to Friday and{10am till 1pm}on Sunday.
